central_courtyard.description: Open central courtyard acting as a focal point for relaxation and natural light.

vastu_principles.balancing_elements: Central courtyard and rooftop terrace balance the flow of energy.

local_building_norms.open_space_requirements: 20% of plot area must be open for ventilation and light.
local_building_norms.fire_safety_regulations: Multiple emergency exits and fire-resistant materials are recommended.
